info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:44PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WORCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE AND NORTHEASTERN HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 543 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belchertown, or 9 miles southeast of Amherst, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 532 PM, amateur radio reported tree down in Granby, MA. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Belchertown, Palmer, Ware, Warren, West Brookfield, Hardwick and New Braintree. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
